name: DoItCorrectly
description:
We human though that we knew our mind well, but this game will let us realize that
how fragile can our mind be when a simple twist can easily crumble our course of thinking and action.

Challenge yourself to be the master of your own mind and body! Or trap in this asylum of looping insanity until death be your only life wish.

Credit:

Madness Team

Programming; M 

Design: K

Sounds: FreeSound.org
